name: daresay
content:
I daresay C2 (also I dare say)
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to say that you agree or think that something is true: "She's got a lot of admirers." "I daresay - she's very beautiful." He gets paid a lot of money, but I daresay (that) he earns it.
